text:
Justyna already mentioned this, but Jasper is incorrectly handling quoting of 
%> inside scriptlets.

The specification indicates that %> is quoted as %\> and that there are no other 
quotation conventions inside a scriptlet.

==========================================

<html>
<body>
<%@ taglib uri="http://java.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib" prefix="eg" %>

  <%-- This is legal in the spec, but Tomcat rejects it --%>
  <%= "Joe said %\>" %>

</body>
</html>

============================

<html>
<body>
<%@ taglib uri="http://java.apache.org/tomcat/examples-taglib" prefix="eg" %>

  <%-- This is not a quotation but Tomcat accepts it as such --%>
  <%= "Joe said %\\>" %>

</body>
</html>
creator: eduardo.pelegrillopart@sun.com
justyna.horwat@sun.com
text: Correct the handling of "\" in quoted expression values. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.
